questions.question: Set in the sky atop giant clouds, this arc features a battle against the 'God' of Skypiea, Enel, and the discovery of an ancient bell. What is...?
This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates arrive on a mysterious island governed by strict time rules and encounter the Foxy Pirates. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This technique, used by Franky, involves a powerful blast from his mechanical body. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This captain of the Kid Pirates is known for his magnetic powers and rivalry with the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This commander of the Revolutionary Army's eastern forces is known for her ability to turn her body into art. Who is...?
This character, originally from Drum Island, is noted for his blue-nose and ability to shapeshift. Who is...?
